mapper.sql: ID, MAT_SERVE_ID, NAME, LEVEL_CERT, LICENCE_AUTHORITH, EXP_START_DATE, EXP_END_DATE, MOT, ATTACH, CODE
mapper.insert:
insert into T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_CERT_SERVE
ID,
MAT_SERVE_ID,
NAME,
CODE,
LEVEL_CERT,
LICENCE_AUTHORITH,
EXP_START_DATE,
EXP_END_DATE,
MOT,
ATTACH,
#{id},
#{matServeId},
#{name},
#{code},
#{levelCert},
#{licenceAuthorith},
#{expStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{expEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{mot},
#{attach},
mapper.update:
update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_CERT_SERVE
MAT_SERVE_ID = #{matServeId},
NAME = #{name},
CODE = #{code},
LEVEL_CERT = #{levelCert},
LICENCE_AUTHORITH = #{licenceAuthorith},
EXP_START_DATE = #{expStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EXP_END_DATE = #{expEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MOT = #{mot},
ATTACH = #{attach},
where ID = #{id}

update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_CERT_SERVE set MAT_SERVE_ID = #{matServeId}, NAME = #{name}, LEVEL_CERT = #{levelCert}, LICENCE_AUTHORITH = #{licenceAuthorith}, EXP_START_DATE = #{expStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EXP_END_DATE = #{expEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MOT = #{mot}, ATTACH = #{attach} where ID = #{id}
mapper.select: select t1.*, t3.ID as ID_, t3.NAME as FILE_NAME from T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_CERT_SERVE t1 left join T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_MAT_SERVE t2 on t1.MAT_SERVE_ID = t2. ID left join T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_ATTACHMENT t3 on t3.BUSINESS_ID = t1. ID where t2.SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId}
